form.label: Hardware
form.searchTemplate: sourcetype=beeware bw_eventlogs_class="MONITORING" bw_ibox_name="$bw_ibox_name$" monitoring_metric="$monitoring_metric$" | fields bw_ibox_name monitoring_metric monitoring_state monitoring_object

input.label: filter by ibox
input.populatingSearch: sourcetype=beeware bw_eventlogs_class="MONITORING" | table bw_ibox_name | dedup bw_ibox_name

input.label: filter by event
input.populatingSearch: sourcetype=beeware bw_eventlogs_class="MONITORING" | table monitoring_metric | dedup monitoring_metric

single.searchPostProcess: search monitoring_metric="bwmem:free.value" monitoring_state="*trigger*" | stats count as result | rangemap field=result low=0-15 elevated=20-50 default=severe
single.title: Memory warnings

single.searchPostProcess: search monitoring_metric="load:cpu_status.value" monitoring_state="*trigger*" | stats count as result | rangemap field=result low=0-15 elevated=20-50 default=severe
single.title: CPU load warnings

single.searchPostProcess: search monitoring_metric="dfbw:free.value" monitoring_state="*trigger*" | stats count as result | rangemap field=result low=0-15 elevated=20-50 default=severe
single.title: Low disk space warnings

chart.searchPostProcess: search (monitoring_metric="dfbw:free.value" OR monitoring_metric="load:cpu_status.value" OR monitoring_metric="bwmem:free.value" monitoring_state="*trigger*") AND monitoring_state="*trigger*" | stats count(eval(monitoring_metric=="dfbw:free.value")) as "Disk space", count(eval(monitoring_metric=="load:cpu_status.value")) as "CPU load", count(eval(monitoring_metric=="bwmem:free.value")) as "Memory leak" by bw_ibox_name | rename bw_ibox_name as ibox
chart.title: Hardware warnings by ibox

table.searchPostProcess: eval status=if(monitoring_state=="normal value","normal","warning") | table _time bw_ibox_name monitoring_object monitoring_metric status | rename monitoring_metric as event monitoring_object as object
table.title: 10 last messages
